comment: Closure of a group sum in a linear subspace: A (finitely supported) sum of scalar multiplications of vectors of a subset of a linear subspace is also contained in the linear subspace. (Contributed by AV, 20-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)
